scripts.start: firebase use staging && firebase serve --only hosting,functions --port 4001
scripts.deploy-api: firebase use dev; firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-api-staging: firebase use staging; firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-api-production: firebase use production; firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-rules: firebase use dev; firebase deploy --only database
scripts.deploy-rules-staging: firebase use staging; firebase deploy --only database
scripts.deploy-rules-production: firebase use production; firebase deploy --only database
